reviews.review: this game should be fun and exciting to play especially with friends, there are so any cheater and hacker though but beside those, its fun
Llevo 2 años jugando csgo y todo lo que llevo jugando me encanta, lo recomiendo mucho.

It is still fun to play even after playing 800 hours. It's like this game has its special mechanics that no other game can replicate. It has a different feeling than every other FPS I played. Chatting with people in MM is really fun for me so that is a big plus for me too.
